snippet: Edward R. Murrow High School won its division in the scholastic championships last week, and Webster University of St. Louis was the Final Four of College Chess title winner.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Edward R Murrow High School in Brooklyn won its division in scholastic championships, and Webster University of St Louis is Final Four of College Chess title winner.
lead_paragraph: Edward R. Murrow High School won its division in the scholastic championships last week, and Webster University of St. Louis was the Final Four of College Chess title winner.

headline.print_headline: Brooklyn School Takes Title At the ‘Supernationals’
headline.seo: Chess: Murrow High School Wins Title
headline.main: Brooklyn School Takes Title at the ‘Supernationals’
